item.title: RISER SF Bay - Resilient Infrastructures as Seas Rise.
item.description: The governance of sea level rise in the San Francisco Bay Area.

item.title: The Governance of Sea Level Rise for Transportation Corridors across California
item.description: This project investigates the governance structure surrounding specific transportation corridors that are impacted by sea level rise in three different areas of California: the San Francisco Bay Area, Los Angeles and San Diego County. The project is financed by a grant I received from the Institute for Transportation Studies (ITS) at UC Davis, resulting from funding provided by State of California in relation to the SB1 bill.
